title: 3.1 - User must be authorized to create a new minor contract
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all / admin-nyy-all
2. Go to advanced search
3. Do a International Amateur Player Search
4. Use filter Eligible to Sign Date is on or before current date
5. Search for any eligible to sign international player
6. Select a player
7. Go to contracts tab
8. Click Create New
9. Click Minor Contract
10. Log into club-boc-all / club-nyy-all
11. Go to advanced search
12. Do a International Amateur Player Search
13. Use filter Eligible to Sign Date is on or before current date
14. Search for any eligible to sign international player
15. Select a player
16. Go to contracts tab
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged in
2. Advanced search is opened.
3. International Amateur search is selected
4. Filter Eligible to Sign Date is On or Before current date is used
5. Search results appear with eligible to sign international amateur players
6. Players profile appears
7. Contract history appears
8. Create new options appear for player
9. Minor contract details page appears.
10. Successfully logged in.
11. Advanced search is opened.
12. International Amateur search is selected
13. Filter Eligible to Sign Date is On or Before current date is used
14. Search results appear with eligible to sign international amateur players
15. Players profile appears
16. Contract history appears but no create button appears

title: 3.2 - Contract can not be created for players with a Hidden profile
custom_steps:
1. Log into club-boc-intl
2. Go to create new widget
3. Fufill all required fields
4. Set birthdate prior to 1996
5. Click Hidden Profile Checkbox
6. Click Next
7. Scroll to the bottom and click save
8. Log into admin-boc-all
9. Go to Advanced search
10. Do a international amateur player search
11. Use Last name equals (Player recently created last name)
12. Select player
13. Click Contracts tab
14. Click Create New
15. Click Minor Contracts
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged in
2. Create new option for International Amateur Player
3. All required fields are entered
4. Date of Birth is set prior to 1996
5. Hidden profile checkbox is checked
6. Brings up International Amateur profile creation details page
7. Profile successfully saved with blue notification on bottom right.
8. Successfully logged in
9. Advanced Search is opened
10. International amateur player search is set
11. Player user created is found on search results
12. Player profile appears
13. Contract history appears
14. Create new options appear
15. Error message that says "A contract cannot be created for a Hidden profile. Please reveal the profile and try again." with a back button

title: 3.2 - Contract can not be created for players with a suspect profile
custom_steps:
1.Log into admin-mlsb-intl
2.Go to create new widget
3.Fufill all required fields
4.Set date of birth after 1996
5.Click Next
6.Change scouting status to Suspect Profile
7.Scroll to the bottom and click save
8.Log into admin-boc-all
9.Go to Advanced search
10.Do a international amateur player search
11.Use Last name equals (Player recently created last name)
12.Select player
13.Click Contracts tab
14.Click Create New
15.Click Minor Contracts
custom_expected:
1.Successfully logged in
2.Create new option for International Amateur Player
3.All required fields are entered
4.Date of Birth is set after 1996
5.Brings up International Amateur profile creation details page
6.Scouting status is changed to suspect profile
7.Profile successfully saved with blue notification on bottom right
8.Successfully logged in
9.Advanced Search is opened
10.International amateur player search is set
11.Player user created is found on search results
12.Player profile appears
13.Contract history appears
14.Create new options appear
15.Error message that says "A contract cannot be created for a Suspect profile. Please update the profile with the remaining required fields and try again." with a back button

title: 3.3 - System knows when to create a 1st Year International Contract
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Go to advanced search
3. Do a international amateur player search
4. Use filters home country is not United States
5. Click search
6. Select a player from the search results
7. Click on contracts tab
8. Click on create new
9. Click on Minor Contracts
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged in
2. Advanced search is opened
3. International amateur player search is used
4. Filter of home country is not United States
5. Search results appear with home country is not United States
6. A players profile page appears
7. Contract history appears
8. Create new options appears
9. Contract page appears that is a 1st Year International contract

title: 3.5 - Cannot create a new contract if a preliminary contract already exists for the same player and org
custom_preconds: International players can have multiple preliminary contracts if they are from different orgs
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-nyy-all
2. Go to advanced search
3 Do a minor contract search
4. Use filters Status is Preliminary and Contract Type is First Year International
5. Click Search
6. Select Player's name
7. Click Contracts tab
8. Click Create New
9. Click Minor Contracts
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged on
2. Advanced Search is opened up
3. Minor Contract Search is used.
4. Filters <Status is Preliminary> and <Contract Type is First Year International>
5. Search Results populate
6. Players info pages appears
7. Contract history appears with a preliminary contract
8. Create new menu pops up
9. Error appears the says "A new contract may not be created while a preliminary contract already exists for this player" with Open Existing contract button and back button

title: 3.6 - If R4 status is Not Subject but home country is US, ask user what contract type to create
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Go to advanced search
3. Do a international amateur player search
4. Use filter R4 Status is Not Subject and Home Country is US
5. Click Search
6. Select a player's name
7. Go to Contracts tab
8. Click Create new
9. Click Minor Contracts
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged in.
2. Advanced Search is opened.
3. International Amateur player search is chosen
4. Filters <R4 Status is Not Subject> and <Home Country is US> is selected
5. Search results appear
6. Players info page appears.
7. Contract history page appears
8. Create new menu appears
9. Error appears the says "Player has US home address but a Rule 4 draft status of Not Subject. What contract would you like to create? Selecting 'Domestic' will change the player's Rule 4 status to Passed Over" with three buttons. [Domestic Contract] [International Contract] [Back]

title: 3.7 - Cannot create a new contract for a player until his eligible date.
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Go to advanced search
3. Use International Amateur Player Search
4. Use filter Eligibile to sign date is On or After current date
5. Click Search
6. Select Player from search results
7. Go to contracts tab
8. Click Create New
9. Click Minor Contract
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged on
2. Advanced search is opened
3. International Amateur player search is used
4. Filter <Eligible to Sign Date> <On or After> <Current date>
5. Search results appear
6. Players info page appears
7. Contract history widget appears
8. Create new options comes up
9. Error message appears the says "New Minor League Contract may only be created for this player on or after his eligible to sign date" with back button

title: Business Rule 5.14 - Contract must be submitted (with or without attachment) within 2 days of Date Signed by Player.
custom_preconds: Contract must be submitted (with or without attachment) within 2 days of Date Signed by Player. If later than this, Club must fill out the comments field in Complete Section
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-mnc-dapm
2. Go to Advanced Search on Left Navigation
3. Do a Domestic Amateur Player Search
4. Use Filter Date of Birth and select on or after Jan.1996
5. Click Search button
6. Select a player (Ex.Aiello, John)
7. Go to Contracts Tab
8. Click on Create New button
9. Click Minor Contract
10. Fill out required fields
11. Put Date Signed by Player 3 Days ahead of current date
12. Change "Update Status to" to Submit to BOC
13. Click Update Status
14. Click Back Button
15. Click Update Status
16. (BOC Only) Click Override button
17. Put Date Signed by Player 3 Days ahead of current date
18. Change "Update Status to" to Submit to BOC
19. Click Update Status
20. Click Back Button
21. Fill in comments in complete section
22. Click Update Status
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged into admin-boc-mnc-dapm
2. Advanced search is opened with filters
3. Change search to Domestic Amateur Player
4. Changes filter forms to "Date of Birth" "On or After" "Jan.1st.1996"
5. Search results appear
6. Players info tab is opened up
7. Contracts Tab is appears on screen
8. Contract selection is appears
9. New contract is opened up
10. New minor contract details page appears with all required fields filled out
11. Date signed by player is now 3 days ahead of current date
12. Update status to form is changed to submit to BOC
13. Error appears indicating to user that "You are submitting this contract over 2 days after the Signing Date. Please use the Club Comments field to explain the reason for the delay" with Override and back button
14. Jump page to comments field on Complete Section
15. Error appears indicating to user that "You are submitting this contract over 2 days after the Signing Date. Please use the Club Comments field to explain the reason for the delay" with Override and back button
16. (BOC only) Continue with contract submission
17. Date signed by player is now 3 days ahead of current date
18. Update status to form is changed to submit to BOC
19. Error appears indicating to user that "You are submitting this contract over 2 days after the Signing Date. Please use the Club Comments field to explain the reason for the delay" with Override and back button
20. Jump page to comments field on Complete Section
21. Comments section is completed
22. Contract successfully submitted

title: Business Rule 5.15 - Signed physical contract, or the completed e-signed contract must be attached within 20 days of signing date.
custom_preconds: The signed physical contract, or the completed e-signed contract must be attached within 20 days of signing date. Otherwise club must fill out the Complete screen club Comments field
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-mnc-dapm
2. Go to Advanced Search on Left Navigation
3. Do a Domestic Amateur Player Search
4. Use Filter Date of Birth and select on or after Jan.1996
5. Click Search button
6. Select a player (Ex.Aiello, John)
7. Go to Contracts Tab
8. Click on Create New button
9. Click Minor Contract
10. Fill out required fields
11. Put signing date 21 days before current date
12. Change "Update Status to" to Submit to BOC
13. Click Update Status
14. Click Back Button
15. Click Update Status
16. (BOC Only) Click Override button
17. Click on Create New button
18. Click Minor Contract
19. Fill out required fields
20. Put signing date 21 days before current date
21. Change "Update Status to" to Submit to BOC
22. Click Update Status
23. Click Back Button
24. Fill in comments in complete section
25. Click Update Status
custom_expected:
1. Successfully logged into admin-boc-mnc-dapm
2. Advanced search is opened with filters
3. Change search to Domestic Amateur Player
4. Changes filter forms to "Date of Birth" "On or After" "Jan.1st.1996"
5. Search results appear
6. Players info tab is opened up
7. Contracts Tab is appears on screen
8. Contract selection is appears
9. New contract is opened up
10. Required fields are populated and filled out
11. Signing date is now 21 days before current date
12. Update status to form is changed to submit to BOC
13. Error appears indicating to user that "You are submitting the fully signed contract over 20 days after the Signing Date. Please use the Club Comments field on the Complete Section to explain the reason for the delay" with Override and back button
14. Jump page to comments field on Complete Section
15. Error appears indicating to user that "You are submitting the fully signed contract over 20 days after the Signing Date. Please use the Club Comments field on the Complete Section to explain the reason for the delay" with Override and back button
16. (BOC only) Continue with contract submission
17. Contract selection is appears
18. New contract is opened up
19. Required fields are populated and filled out
20. Signing date is now 21 days before current date
21. Update status to form is changed to submit to BOC
22. Error appears indicating to user that "You are submitting the fully signed contract over 20 days after the Signing Date. Please use the Club Comments field on the Complete Section to explain the reason for the delay" with Override and back button
23. Jump page to comments field on Complete Section
24. Comments section is completed
25. Contract successfully submitted

title: Business Rule 7.3 - Users can only open and view attachments after the contract has reached "Approved" state
custom_preconds: All other users can view the contract in its latest Approved, Terminated, Expired, Voided states OR earliest Terms Accepted state. These users can only open and view attachments after the contract has reached "Approved" state
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Click on 'Search' on the left-hand tool bar
3. Do a professional player search
4. For player last name, enter 'Comer', and for player first name, enter 'Chad'
5. Click on Comer, Chad
6. Click on contracts tab
7. Select most recent approved contract
8. Expand 'Attached File(s)' section by clicking on '+' symbol
9. Select attached file to open
custom_expected:
1. Successfully log onto admin-boc-all. Home screen displayed
2. Go to advanced search
3. Change search to professional player
4. <Last name> <Equals> <Comer> and <First name> <Equals> <Chad> added to filters section
5. Taken to player's info page
6. Contract history widget for player is displayed with recent contracts
7. Contract opened in new page, information displayed
8. 'Attached File(s)' section is expanded, displaying any attached files
9. IN APPROVED STATE ONLY (Unless BOC or current ORG of player) - files downloaded and viewable for user

title: Business Rule 7.4 - In non-editable states, BOC can still edit the Attached files section by hitting the EDIT button but the rest of the contract is un-editable
custom_preconds: BOC can edit the entire contract in all states except Terminated, Expired and Voided. In these non-editable states, BOC can still edit the Attached files section by hitting the EDIT button but the rest of the contract is un-editable.
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Go to advanced search
3. Do a Professional Player search and search for player, "Comer, Chad"
4. Select "Comer, Chad" in search results
5. Click contracts tab
6. Open most recent expired contract that has an attachment
7. Go to attachments section and expand
8. Click edit
custom_expected:
1. Successfully log into admin-boc-all
2. Advanced search screen displayed
3. Search results should display one result - Chad Comer
4. Taken to player's information page
5. Contract history widget with player's contract history is displayed
6. Contract is opened in view mode
7. Attachments section is expanded showing any attachments for the contract (still in view mode)
8. Attachments are editable, but the rest of the contract is only in view mode (cannot be edited)

title: Business Rule 7.5 - Club users can add new attachments to the contract in "Terms Submitted" and "Terms Accepted" states but they cannot edit any other part of the contract or edit existing attachments
custom_preconds: Club users where ORG is the contract's signing org can edit contract only in Preliminary, Submit to Club, Update Terms Submitted and Update Terms Accepted states. The club users can also add new attachments to the contract in "Terms Submitted" and "Terms Accepted" states but they cannot edit any other part of the contract or edit existing attachments. If user cannot edit the contract at all (including attachments), hide EDIT button.
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-nyy-all
2. Do an advanced search for minor contract
3. Use filter Signing org is New York Yankees
4. Select a player with no 2015 contract and is affiliated with yankees
5. Click on contract tab
6. Create a new contract
7. Fill out all required fields
8. Submit to BOC
9. Click edit
custom_expected:
1. Successfully log into admin-nyy-all
2. In advanced search, 'Search For' dropdown populated with 'Minor Contract'
3. In added filters section, it will say <Signing Org/Club> <Is> <NYY> <All>
4. Taken to player's information screen
5. Contract history widget with player's contract history is displayed
6. New contract is generated. Opened to Addendum A in edit mode
7. All fields are filled
8. Status of contract is updated to "Terms Submitted" and is now in view mode
9. Only attachments section becomes editable. Rest of contract is still in view mode

title: Business Rule 7.6 - When contract is in Preliminary state, open contract directly in Edit mode. For all other states, first open contract in View mode.
custom_preconds: When contract is in Preliminary state, open contract directly in Edit mode. For all other states, first open contract in View mode.
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Click on 'Search' on the left-hand nav bar
3. In 'Search For' dropdown, select 'Minor Contract'
4. Choose filter <Status> <Is> <Preliminary>
5. Click 'Search'
6. Select a player by clicking on player's name
7. Click on the 'Contracts' tab
8. Choose the most recent preliminary minor contract (Red Text)
custom_expected:
1. Successfully log onto admin-boc-all
2. Advanced search screen is displayed
3. 'Minor Contract' populates in 'Search For' dropdown
4. Filter, <Status> <Is> <Preliminary>, is added to 'Added Filters' section
5. Search results displayed of players with current preliminary minor contracts
6. Taken to player's info page
7. Contract history widget with player's contract history is displayed
8. Contract is opened in edit mode. All fields are editable

title: Business Rule 9.2.7
Business Rule 10.1.10
Business Rule 10.2.3
Business Rule 10.3.6
Business Rule 10.4.4
Business Rule 10.4.5
Advanced Search Org/Club Sub-filters
custom_steps:
1. Log into admin-boc-all
2. Go to advanced search
3. Select Minor Contracts Search
4. Select Signing Org/Club filter
5. Check all dropdowns
custom_expected:
1.Successfully Logged into admin-boc-all
2. Advanced search opens up
3. Minor Contracts search is selected
4. Four dropdowns defaults to "Signing Org/Club" "Equals" "Ari" "All"
5. Dropdowns all have correct signing orgs and clubs in each filter
*Check Data Discovery for a list of orgs / clubs
